items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content.

meta.description: Interactive React accordion component with Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI & Radix UI. Expand and collapse content sections easily.

items.title: Alert
items.description: Displays a callout for user attention.

meta.description: Displays a callout for user attention. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response.

meta.description: Captures user attention with an important modal prompt requiring a response. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with fallbacks for representing the user.

meta.description: An image element with fallback options to represent users. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or status indicator.

meta.description: Shows a badge or status indicator to highlight information. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays a breadcrumb navigation.

meta.description: Provides breadcrumb navigation for easy site hierarchy tracking. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React..

items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

meta.description: Showcasing a customizable React button component built with Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI & Radix UI for your projects.

items.title: Calendar
items.description: A date picker component with range and single date selection.

meta.description: A date picker component supporting single and range selection. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, react day picker and React.

items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

meta.description: A card component showcasing a header, content, and footer section. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Carousel
items.description: A carousel component for cycling through a series of content.

meta.description: A carousel component for smoothly cycling through multiple content items. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, embla carousel and React.

items.title: Chart
items.description: Beautiful charts. Built using Recharts. Copy and paste into your apps.

meta.description: Create beautiful and interactive charts for your projects. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, recharts and React.

items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

meta.description: A control that lets users toggle between checked and unchecked states. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Collapsible
items.description: Used to hide and show content with a smooth animation.

meta.description: Toggle content visibility with smooth animations using a collapsible component. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Combobox
items.description: Combines a text input with a list of options.

meta.description: A text input paired with a selectable list of options. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Command
items.description: Fast, composable command palette component.

meta.description: A fast and composable command palette for efficient navigation. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, cmdk and React.

items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — triggered by a right click.

meta.description: A menu that appears on right-click for quick actions. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Data Table
items.description: Display complex data in a table format with filtering, sorting and pagination.

meta.description: Organize and display complex data with sorting, filtering, and pagination. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, tanstack table and React.

items.title: Date Picker
items.description: A styled date picker component built using calendar.

meta.description: A styled component for selecting dates easily. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui, react day picker and React.

items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.

meta.description: An overlay window that appears above the main or another dialog. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Drawer
items.description: A panel that slides out from the edge of the screen.

meta.description: A sliding panel that appears from the screen edge. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — triggered by a button.

meta.description: A menu that opens on button click for easy selection. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

meta.description: Allows users to preview content on hover before clicking a link. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Input
items.description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.

meta.description: A form input field for user data entry or interactive input. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Input OTP
items.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality.

items.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links.

items.description: A pop-up element that appears next to a trigger element.

meta.description: A pop-up element that appears beside a trigger for extra information. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.

meta.description: Shows a visual indicator of task completion progress. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—only one can be selected at a time.

meta.description: A group of selectable buttons where only one option can be chosen. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button.

meta.description: A selectable list of options triggered by a button for user choice. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Sheet
items.description: Extends the Dialog component to create panels that slide in from the edge of the screen.

meta.description: Panels that slide in from the screen edge, extending the dialog functionality. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.description: A composable, themeable and customizable sidebar component.

items.description: Displays a placeholder preview of your content before it loads.

meta.description: A placeholder preview that mimics content layout before loading. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.

items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when hovered.

meta.description: A popup showing contextual information when hovering over an element. Built with Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, radix ui and React.
